website_summaries.verdict: A good little inexpensive launcher for a small dog who likes to fetch small balls.
pros: Designed with your small dog in mind
cons: The balls used with this machine are very small and might not be big enough for some dogs to enjoy fetching

customer_reviews.title: the thrower itself is great, its the balls that are the worst
customer_reviews.text: the thrower itself is great, its the balls that are the worst! they do not hold up to dog chewing even a little. and other standard size small balls don't work with this rendering it all but useless. the devil is in the detail folks. all they need is the chuck-it sized small balls to work & this would be amazing. but they dont fit. very bummed about this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tobey

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my previous review from August. We've had this about three months. We play every night. The ball got jammed periodically, but was Al ways easy to fix. Then last night it jammed forever. I can't fix it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Paisley

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Ball Launcher and Thrower fails to deliver the pitch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product it failed to perform a couple of weeks after the purchase. I returned it and ordered another one. Now we are beyond the return window and this one no longer works either. The balls get stuck and the motor fails to launch the balls. Do not buy this product.balls. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelangelo S

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but, my pups did not play much with it. The foam balls which come with it don't last long, but, you can use Kong XS balls with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The machine is good but took my dog 20 mins to chew the balls in 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I guess I have to try a more expensive version
customer_reviews.text: The Dalles get stuck constantly because of the dog slobber on them by the time my dog brings it back. Therefore it requires me to wave off the ball to put it in the machine so that he can play with it and that's not Really what I was looking for. Therefore one star.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: My dog (toy poodle) loves this. As it was ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog (toy poodle) loves this. As it was delivered, I would give it 2 stars. He's a light chewer, and destroyed the included balls before I had the thrower plugged in. But I purchased these balls: Extra Small Dog Tennis Balls Pack of 12 by Midlee (Blue/Yellow, 1.5 inch)  And they work perfectly! Buy the thrower, throw the balls away, and get the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zieren

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs! Easy to use. Balls don't last though.
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's easy to use. Don't have to do anything but plug it in and put the ball in the hole. My dog loves it! Still doesn't know how to use it, but if he learned to be potty trained, he can learn to put the ball in the hole. Only downfall is the easy to tear balls. Gone in less than 5 minutes. The ball should be made in racquetball material. It's the only ball that has outlived any other (soccerball, basketball, tennisball, etc...)
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Garcia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not for the poorly trained dog-loading issue
customer_reviews.text: I have chihuahuas. Tiny mouths. I bought kong balls as well as I read not many balls came w this toy. My complaint it that it’s more of a people’s toy in my house, as I have to load it each and every time. Not the toy’s fault. My dog stares at the top where you load it but won’t drop the balls in there lol
customer_reviews.author: Griselle

customer_reviews.title: Play Ball
customer_reviews.text: Wow, do the boys like this game. I have a bad arm and it was getting hard to throw the ball. On high setting in the hall it goes the whole length and hits a door and bounces back so they get plenty of exercise. No need to play outside on rainy days. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: phyllis hansen

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: To find out that the balls with this launcher are much smaller than a normal sized tennis ball and this would better suit a small dog. I have a Lab and while she loves to chase these balls, she also chews on them and I worry about them becoming lodged in her throat. I will definitely read through descriptions more thoroughly in the future because I felt this picture was misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine but needs better balls and bugs fixed
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine but needs better balls. They are too soft and get chewed up easily. The replacement tennis balls clog the machine... Also the ball that comes with it gets jammed up in there. When it works it's great. I hope they will replace this when they figure out the problems
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Happy as of now :)
customer_reviews.text: My babies are so happy with this, it just got stuck one time but I was able to take the ball out. They haven’t figure out how to use it themselves yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Our Playball Launcher arrived three days ago, exactly on schedule; and our curious, little German 8 lb. Yorkie knew that it was something for him before it was taken out of the box. I set it up immediately, and he began to play. He loves this toy more than any that we've ever purchased for him. He has not yet placed the ball into the launcher, but I'm sure that will come with time. We've been playing for 30 minutes about three times a day. If I didn't stop to do chores, I know the play time would be much longer. This is a great, and exceptionally well-made toy with exercise benefits; and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MK in Corpus Christi

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL PIECE OF JUNK!!
customer_reviews.text: What a complete and total piece of junk this thing is!!!!! It jammed up the very first time I tried using it... I don't even know where to start with this thing ...the balls get stuck CONSTANTLY and the material they're made out of shreds fairly instantly as soon as the dog bites into it. not sturdy at all ..I bought some extra small Kong balls as well for it and those were destroyed within minutes and get stuck in the machine..DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY!! there have got to be better products on the market than this thing ...I totally regret wasting my hard-earned money on this piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Manager M

customer_reviews.title: SOFT BALLS! MY DOG RIPPED THE BALL APART
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great no I'm not lazy I just don't want to play ball 24/7 like my morkie does. I gave this only 3 stars because the machine is great love the battery or plug in option. The thing I don't get is why send soft balls with this when everyone knows dogs chew on everything! The balls are SOFT! MY DOG ATE ONE! I noticed it because he was too quiet. There he was under a chair chewing up the ball ripping it up. GREAT IDEA WHO EVER MADE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: machine on the other hand worked great! Kind of difficult to remove stuck balls but ...
customer_reviews.text: four stars.balls are foam rubber and my Boston shredded them within minutes.machine on the other hand worked great! Kind of difficult to remove stuck balls but after a while it becomes easy. Super frickin hilarious I still have to load it.hopefuly my dog will figure it out soon.found replacement balls at target.kong mini tennis balls.size of ping pong ball.dont buy medium size won't work.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: I love this launcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this launcher, but the balls tear up in like a day - so you buy more, and then they tear up. If they can fix the type of balls it takes, then I would give it 5 stars, as it works great, but if you can't use it, it's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: I do like the Playball launcher
customer_reviews.text: I do like the Playball launcher.It is all I expected.It throws the balls very far &, I like that it stays on to wait for my dog to bring the balls back.I do however wish the balls were somewhat bigger.(I do know I could get a different launcher of larger size but I didn't like the functions of other launchers.)If the "PLAYBALL" launcher came w/a larger launch hole to accommodate a larger ball (or even a squeaky ball & kept the simplicity of the launches-it would be great!) But I do like this launcher. Sincerely, Carolyn
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Balls too soft and easily destroyed.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the launcher for indoor play when it's over 100 degrees outside. But in just 3 days my Jack Russel mix has destroyed 2 of the 3 balls that came with it. The balls are quite soft and any chewing breaks out pieces of foam.
customer_reviews.author: Dee S.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Received broken product. The switch that turns the “on”, “off” button on was broken when we opened it. It was completely broken off the product like the soldering or glue didn’t even work. This is the second one of these we have ordered (the other one was a different brand) neither one has worked. So disappointed. What a huge waste of money. Seller reached out, said they would send a replacement machine. Will update my review if/when I receive it.
customer_reviews.author: DiAnna Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dog so she could get more exercise over the winter and she loves it. She hasn’t learned to put the balls in the launcher herself yet but we’re working on it. I was worried that she would chew up the small foam balls but she hasn’t so far. I will get the extra small Kong balls too. The launcher works great and I like the three different settings. My dog is really enjoying this toy a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you can get your dog to cooperate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product in theory, unless you have dogs like mine, who refuse to put the ball in the launcher. They also won't bring the ball back to me, so I get more exercise than they do!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis D'Ambrosio Nichols

customer_reviews.title: D
customer_reviews.text: It comes with tiny foam balls that my dog chewed up in all of 5 mins. And when we tried the same size tennis balls for her the darn things would just get stuck. So if you dog is like mine don't waste the money
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: Ball frequently gets stuck.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the machine. Unfortunately, the machine frequently gets stuck and has to be reset. After a while I get too frustrated with it and toss the thing in a closet later to retrieve and try again hoping for the best. Pretty much following the definition of insane. At this point I'm ready to toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Warren

customer_reviews.title: good but I had to buy the balls that feel ...
customer_reviews.text: good but I had to buy the balls that feel more like the ones she's used to the smaller sized tennis balls. Other than that we are all happy especially my arm.
customer_reviews.author: Erma M

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought small tennis balls to replace the ones that come with it. My dog is either too dumb or lazy to put the ball in himself. Great toy though
customer_reviews.author: movjo77

customer_reviews.title: I need to read the fine print!
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my Animals, however could be perfect for smaller critters?
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product ! .. sadly my dog is so social that he insist I put the ball in for him & cheer him on... LOL I was hoping it was something he would play with when we are at work & not be so lonely or bored.. We do have fun with it though.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent machine. Well made and responds exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent machine. Well made and responds exactly as described. It may take a while for your doggy to get comfortable putting the ball in, but be patient he may eventually catch on given enough time. Mine puts the ball in, but now he enjoys knocking the machine around like it's suppose to make it's own balls. He's a bit neurotic about balls, so hopefully this is a unique case !
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: My pup Loves this toy!! I previously had bought a different brand and it had no power! This one is awesome!! Great power and really does shoot the balls the distance it promises!!! I only wish it came with more balls!
customer_reviews.author: JClark

customer_reviews.title: Need to re-think about better durability of balls
customer_reviews.text: Needs work. Balls are extremely cheap for lil dogs with sharp teeth. Need to re-think about better durability of balls. Balls would also get stuck in the machine alot. I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Sue Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I decided not to return this....which was a mistake! Most of the time it will not eject the ball, it’s so frustrating for me and my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has 3 distance settings so we can use it inside and outside safely! I was just a little disappointed in how small the balls were but the description was correct I just didn't pay enough attention.
customer_reviews.author: pmacd

customer_reviews.title: Good time
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product just wish the balls that came with it was not foam.
customer_reviews.author: countiscoffee234

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, very entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this toy and my dog loves It! Unfortunately she isn't very smart and has had a few balls hit her right in the face which was funny, but we did have a ball get stuck and I emailed the company and they were nice enough to show me How! Only thing I would change is this is only for extra small balls which you need to be careful so the dog does not choke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The balls didn’t last 6 hrs. In pieces! Not dog friendly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The dog loves it, the only fault is do ...
customer_reviews.text: The dog loves it, the only fault is do not put a ball in without power on as it takes an engineer to get it back out.
customer_reviews.author: Bill @ Fort Meade

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun for my small dog. Balls wear out quickly, so be prepared to buy some others.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A

customer_reviews.title: My dogs favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our yorkie and she loves it! The balls are the perfect size and it has different throwing speeds/distances!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to power button not able to change speed or power down the unit. The product rattles and moves on wood floor and scares my dog. Very disappointed!!! Update: 2/8/2018 The company sent a brand new machine and it’s working just fine. I’m blown away that they even did that. Wow!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: My little Yorkie Poo is absolutely obsessed!! We have to hide it when we are not playing with it. Wish the balls were more durable but could not be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money... this product is made cheap... the inside ball railing has the skrew holes ran through it, the balls constantly catch and don't shoot. The speed gauge is irrelevant, no matter the setting the ball comes out at the same speed relatively.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Not his blue ball
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s great but the chihuahua only wants to play with his beloved blue ball. He watches the orange ones fly, runs to get them, only to realize it’s not his blue ball. Will continue to try and break him of his blue ball addition. The idea is great but dealing with an obsessive dog is proving troublesome
customer_reviews.author: patricia  neilson

customer_reviews.title: Not good for dog who like to chew
customer_reviews.text: The balls on this thing are very cheap. In about hour my mini poodle had 2 out of the three balls with holes in them
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Product did not work- Was so loud it was frightening ...
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work- Was so loud it was frightening. Came with one ball, not three. Very disappointing. I’m editing my review to 5 stars as their customer service was fantastic. The machine must have been defective to begin with. I trust the product normally would be great....
customer_reviews.author: Audrey feidler

customer_reviews.title: STEER CLEAR!
customer_reviews.text: IThere are so many things wrong with this, and the biggest is there is NO customer service. I have used it for less then 10 hours nad at best it might work one in 30 times. It automatically shuts off too quickly leaving it useless as a toy for a lonely dog to play with when home alone. I have tried numerous ways to contact the company to no avail. AVOID THIS AT ALL COSTS!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: Balls are really really tiny.
customer_reviews.text: It worked was simple to use but the balls were so tiny. They are a choking hazard to any dog bigger than a chihuahua. Also looked and there isnt an easy place to buy more balls. Definitely going back.
customer_reviews.author: Gusgus

customer_reviews.title: but we continue to work on that It is a fun
customer_reviews.text: So far my Buddy has not mastered putting the ball in himself, but we continue to work on that It is a fun toy
customer_reviews.author: Rita M. Marie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it. The balls constantly get stuck. I can't be a true couch potato.
customer_reviews.author: Houston

customer_reviews.title: The balls are junk
customer_reviews.text: The balls are foam. Destroyed in 2 minutes. Very small. 1.5” in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: myle74

customer_reviews.title: Foam balls are too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice idea but the 3 foam balls included are too squishy and way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Does what its supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Works great now if only we can get our dog trained to drop the ball back into shoot for relaunch. Its quiet and dogs are not scared of it.
customer_reviews.author: Huskerpam

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete package
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this with my dog, but there were no balls in the box. Unfortunately, I have to order some balls now. That wouldn’t be necessary if the balls were actually in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Second style of this type toy I’ve sent back! ...
customer_reviews.text: Second style of this type toy I’ve sent back!!! Balls are extremely small and foam. First time trying it out the ball got caught on my dog’s tooth and then I was afraid she’d choke on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: ONLY ONE BALL PER TOSS & BALLS ARE VERY SMALL!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but my dog isn't as smart as ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, but my dog isn't as smart as I thought he is. He refuses to drop the balls into the launcher. He wants us to put it in, it shoots out, he gets the balls and returns them to us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ball launcher works great! It is fun and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Not a shopper

customer_reviews.title: Brakes too easily
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for two weeks now, bought the mini tennis balls to use with it. It is now in the trash. After a while it just stops launching .
customer_reviews.author: jennie dove

customer_reviews.title: Good, but the balls were easily destroyed.
customer_reviews.text: Our papillon enjoyed the machine, but she tore all of the included balls up in one day.
customer_reviews.author: scminter

customer_reviews.title: More exciting for her than one of us throwing the ball for her
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is obsessed with wanting to play ball so needless to say she’s in love with this item
customer_reviews.author: Sshelton

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Everything is exactly what I expected. I love it. My pup is still learning.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gould

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: we only used this 6 times before it broke i would not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... launcher for my pug when it worked it was good but the balls get stuck to much
customer_reviews.text: Got the ball launcher for my pug when it worked it was good but the balls get stuck to much. I returned it mainly because my dog was scared of it.
customer_reviews.author: brynmb

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised!
customer_reviews.text: works as promised. I did have to buy the kong xs balls as suggested but other than that.....it works perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the actual item
customer_reviews.text: I like the actual item, but, the balls do not last , material needs to be made more sturdy, maybe similar material to the Chuckit balls
customer_reviews.author: Gama tita

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our five pound live wire who can wear me out playing ball. She loves it and we are working on learning to put the ball in the launcher. The only drawback were the foam balls they send were chewed up instantly. But I gave them five stars because of the awesome customer service I have received. They respond to my questions or concerns within a couple hours and sent us an email before we even received the product letting us know that they are available. This even entertains our old dog who sits and watches for the ball to launch. Entertainment for the whole family
customer_reviews.author: Allan W.

customer_reviews.title: This little machine is way too loud,
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is way too loud, it also vibrates the floor and scared my dog it shoots the ball way too hard as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the balls are not good for dogs due ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the balls are not good for dogs due to the material and of course the dogs like to chew. Had to go buy different balls.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Herzberg

customer_reviews.title: Balls fall apart quickly if your dog chews
customer_reviews.text: I won't give it 3 because the launcher isn't the problem. The balls are junk. I looked away for 5 minutes and the balls were all tore in pieces. If you get this make sure to order some mini/x-small tennis balls.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: I would NEVER recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 3 days. The ball gets stuck in the machine a lot and it is almost impossible to remove it. There is a lip that the ball will get caught on and as you try to remove it the ball gets chewed up. Also, the ball is so soft that my dog has chewed on it and pieces have come off, which I am afraid she will swallow. I would NEVER recommend this to anyone. I am in the process to notifying the manufacturer to return this and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L Fox

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This didnt work and the balls are not normal size
customer_reviews.author: sheila lavare

customer_reviews.title: Not so good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: Balls are too weak for dog's teeth. When ball is damaged machine has problems
customer_reviews.author: huskychen

product_meta.title: Felix & Fido Playball! Playball Automatic Ball Launcher & Thrower for Dogs - Indoor/Outdoor Use. Throwing Distance Settings + 3 NEW & IMPROVED Balls Included with Our Automatic Dog Ball Launcher
product_meta.description: Ready to have fun with your furry friend? Get the Playball AUTOMATIC TENNIS BALL THROWER FOR DOGS and start having a blast! Our ball launcher for dogs allows you to choose from its 3 launch distance settings making this highly suitable for indoor use. Lights on the launch unit will indicate which distance setting has been chosen. The furthest setting can TOSS THE BALL UP TO 20 FEET! The Playball tennis ball thrower for dogs can operate on both a power plug (included in the box) or on 6 "C" batteries (not included) as well. This makes our launcher useful for both INDOOR AND OUTDOOR PLAY! Our launcher comes with 3 NEW AND IMPROVED mini tennis balls (1.5 inches in diameter each) that are highly durable and can withstand getting wet/ saliva and will not jam your machine. PLEASE TAKE CAUTION TO ONLY LOAD ONE BALL IN THE LAUNCHER AT A TIME. LOADING MORE THAN ONE BALL AT A TIME CAN JAM THE MACHINE. In case you ball gets jammed in the automatic ball launcher, simply tilt the machine back, hold down on the white setting button for 15 seconds which will automatically power up the motor, then tilt the machine forward and your ball will be released. Due to this machine only accommodating small size balls (1.5 inches in diameter), our dog fetching launcher is meant ONLY FOR SMALL SIZE DOGS! The small size balls will present a choking hazard for larger size dogs. As with all pet toys and launchers , play must be supervised by a pet parent! You can play with your pet by dropping the ball into the chute to be launched and when your pet retrieves the ball, simply drop it in again for never ending fun! Alternatively, you can train your pet to use the automatic ball thrower all on its own for self play. When your pet retrieves the ball, simply offer it some treats near the opening of the intake chute if it will drop the ball in. The Playball Launcher can keep your dog healthy and happy! This product makes a great gift!!
feature_bullets: The Playball Automatic Ball Launcher for DOGS is VERY EASY TO USE! Your furry friend will LOVE this toy. Launches balls to 3 different distances, This allows your dog to fetch the ball, bring it back and drop it in the hole at the top where it gets ready to auto-launch a few seconds later.

Our Automatic Dog Ball Thrower is specifically made for SMALL dogs. The Playball automatically launches smooth, mini-sized balls which are 1.5 inches in diameter. This machine is NOT SUITABLE for large dogs.

For INDOOR and OUTDOOR use. Accessories included are a Wall plug (for indoor use) and 3 smooth saliva resistant balls. The Playball Launcher also uses 6 "C" batteries (Not Included) so you can use it outdoors too! This will provide you and your pet with loads of FUN!

Light up settings on the Ball Launcher shows the distance setting for three different launching distances depending on the space you have available, making this an awesome toy for indoor use! Light up settings on the Ball Launcher shows the distance setting currently selected (up to 3 to choose from)

THIS automatic dog ball thrower is INTENDED FOR SMALL DOGS ONLY!! Balls are 1.5 inches in diameter- this tennis ball launcher does NOT use regular size tennis balls. Our NEW and IMPROVED balls are highly durable and made of special material that will not jam in the Playball shooter even when wet!. User manual also included in packaging.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
